First Line: The Advent of Our King
Savior of the Nations, Come
Lift Up Your Heads, You Mighty Gates
Lift Up Your Heads, You Mighty Gates
As Angels Joyed with One Accord
Come, O Long-Expected Jesus
Rejoice, Rejoice, Believers
Come, O Precious Ransom, Come
Jesus, Your Church with Longing Eyes
The Bridegroom Soon Will Call Us
Comfort, Comfort All My People
Hark the Glad Sound! The Savior Comes
There's a Voice in the Wilderness Crying
Arise, O Christian People
Hark! A Thrilling Voice Is Sounding
On Jordan's Bank the Baptist's Cry
God's Own Son Most Holy
O Lord, How Shall I Meet You
O Lord, How Shall I Meet You
When All the World Was Cursed
Tune Name: WAS FRAG ICH NACH DER WELT

First Line: Hosanna to the Coming Lord
O Savior, Rend the Heavens Wide
Tune Name: O HEILAND, REISS DIE HIMMEL AUF

First Line: Oh, Come, Oh, Come, Emmanuel
The Angel Gabriel from Heaven Came
The King Shall Come
Jesus Came, the Heavens Adoring
O Jesus, Lamb of God, You Are
Let the Earth Now Praise the Lord
Lo, He Comes with Clouds Descending
Rise, Arise
O Lord of Light, Who Made the Stars
When Sinners See Their Lost Condition
All Praise to You, Eternal God
Now Sing We, Now Rejoice
Of the Father’s Love Begotten
A Great and Mighty Wonder
Once Again My Heart Rejoices
From Heaven Above to Earth I Come
Now Praise We Christ, the Holy One
O Jesus Christ, Your Manger Is
Tune Name: O JESU CHRIST, DEIN KRIPPLEIN IST

First Line: Let All Together Praise Our God
Come, Your Hearts and Voices Raising
To Thee My Heart I Offer
Break Forth, O Beauteous Heavenly Light
Oh, Rejoice, All Christians, Loudly
Your Little Ones, Dear Lord, Are We
Behold, a Branch Is Growing
When Christmas Morn Is Dawning
Rejoice, Rejoice This Happy Morn
Once in Royal David’s City
I Am So Glad When Christmas Comes
On Christmas Night All Christians Sing
To Shepherds as They Watched by Night
Where Shepherds Lately Knelt
Oh, Come, All Ye Faithful
Gentle Mary Laid Her Child
Go, Tell It on the Mountain
See in Yonder Manger Low
Christ the Lord to Us Is Born
Silent Night! Holy Night
Hark! The Herald Angels Sing
Joy to the World
Angels We Have Heard on High
Let Us All with Gladsome Voice
O Little Town of Bethlehem
O Little Town of Bethlehem
What Child Is This
Away in a Manger
Across the Sky the Shades of Night
Tune Name: ALLEIN GOTT IN DER HÖH SEI EHR

First Line: Help Us, O Lord, for Now We Enter
The Old Year Now Has Passed Away
Tune Name: HERR JESU CHRIST, DICH ZU UNS WEND

First Line: O Lord, Our Father, Thanks and Praise
To God the Anthem Raising
Now Let Us Come before Him
Father, Let Me Dedicate
Jesus! Name of Wondrous Love
Tune Name: GOTT SEI DANK DURCH ALLE WELT

First Line: In His Temple Now Behold Him
O Light of Gentile Nations
How Lovely Shines the Morning Star
Angels from the Realms of Glory
Arise and Shine in Splendor
Songs of Thankfulness and Praise
As with Gladness Men of Old
Jesus Shall Reign Where’er the Sun
O God from God, O Light from Light
The Only Son from Heaven
Tune Name: HERR CHRIST, DER EINIG GOTTS SOHN

First Line: Hail, O Source of Every Blessing
To Jordan Came the Christ, Our Lord
Tune Name: CHRIST UNSER HERR ZUM JORDAN KAM

First Line: To Jordan’s River Came Our Lord
The People that in Darkness Sat
The Star Proclaims the King Is Here
Tune Name: O HEILAND, REISS DIE HIMMEL AUF

First Line: Brightest and Best
Hail to the Lord’s Anointed
O Jesus, King of Glory
How Good, Lord, to Be Here
Oh, Wondrous Type! Oh, Vision Fair
Down from the Mount of Glory
Tune Name: ICH FREU MICH IN DEM HERREN

First Line: Jesus, I Will Ponder Now
Oh, Come, My Soul
A Lamb Goes Uncomplaining Forth
Behold the Lamb of God
Enslaved by Sin and Bound in Chains
Tune Name: WENN WIR IN HÖCHSTEN NÖTEN SEIN

First Line: Glory Be to Jesus
Go to Dark Gethsemane
Sacred Head, Now Wounded
Come to Calvary’s Holy Mountain
Deep Were His Wounds
Jesus, Refuge of the Weary
When O’er My Sins I Sorrow
Tune Name: HERR CHRIST, DER EINIG GOTTS SOHN

First Line: My Song Is Love Unknown
Sweet the Moments, Rich in Blessing
There Is a Fountain Filled with Blood
Upon the Cross Extended
Tune Name: O WELT, ICH MUSS DICH LASSEN

First Line: Christ, the Life of All the Living
He Stood before the Court
In the Hour of Trial
O Dearest Jesus
O Dearest Lord, Thy Sacred Head
Were You There
What Wondrous Love Is This
Jesus, Grant that Balm and Healing
Sing, My Tongue, the Glorious Battle
Lord Jesus Christ, You Set Us Free
Tune Name: WIR DANKEN DIR, HERR JESU CHRIST

First Line: Savior, When in Dust to You
When I Survey the Wondrous Cross
Lord Jesus, You Are Going Forth
Stricken, Smitten, and Afflicted
Tune Name: O MEIN JESU, ICH MUSS STERBEN

First Line: Not All the Blood of Beasts
Alas! and Did My Savior Bleed
Hosanna, Loud Hosanna
All Glory, Laud, and Honor
Ride On, Ride On in Majesty
Ride On, Ride On in Majesty
O Bride of Christ, Rejoice
The Death of Jesus Christ, Our Lord
Tune Name: GOTTLOB, ES GEHT NUNMEHR ZU ENDE

First Line: ’Twas on that Dark, that Doleful Night
Oh, Darkest Woe
Oh, Perfect Life of Love
Jesus, in Your Dying Woes
God Was There on Calvary
At the Lamb’s High Feast We Sing
Come, You Faithful, Raise the Strain
He’s Risen, He’s Risen
Christ Is Arisen
Jesus Lives! The Victory’s Won
His Battle Ended There
Like the Golden Sun Ascending
The Strife Is O’er, the Battle Done
Christ the Lord Is Risen Today
Christ the Lord Is Risen Today; Alleluia
Triumphant from the Grave
I Know that My Redeemer Lives
Alleluia! Jesus Lives
Alleluia, Alleluia, Give Thanks
Christ the Lord Is Risen Again
Awake, My Heart, with Gladness
Jesus Christ Is Risen Today
I Am Content! My Jesus Lives Again
Morning Breaks upon the Tomb
This Joyful Eastertide
Christ Jesus Lay in Death’s Strong Bands
He Is Arisen! Glorious Word
Welcome, Happy Morning
Today in Triumph Christ Arose
O Sons and Daughters of the King
The Day of Resurrection
Jesus Christ, My Sure Defense
With High Delight Let Us Unite
Alleluia! Sing to Jesus
Draw Us to Thee
A Hymn of Glory Let Us Sing
Up through Endless Ranks of Angels
On Christ’s Ascension I Now Build
See, the Conqueror Mounts in Triumph
Hail the Day that Sees Him Rise
Come, Holy Ghost, God and Lord
Come, Holy Ghost, Creator Blest
Come, Holy Ghost, Creator Blest
Hail Thee, Festival Day
Holy Spirit, God of Love
Tune Name: DER TAG, DER IST SO FREUDENREICH

First Line: Come, Oh, Come, Life-Giving Spirit
Tune Name: KOMM, O KOMM, DU GEIST DES LEBENS

First Line: Holy Spirit, Ever Dwelling
Holy Spirit, Light Divine
O Holy Spirit, Enter In
O Holy Spirit, Grant Us Grace
O Spirit of Life, O Spirit of God
When God the Spirit Came
Creator Spirit, by Whose Aid
Jehovah, Let Me Now Adore You
We Now Implore God the Holy Ghost
Father Most Holy, Merciful, and Tender
Triune God, Oh, Be Our Stay
Tune Name: GOTT DER VATER WOHN UNS BEI

First Line: Come, Now, Almighty King
Oh, that I Had a Thousand Voices
Tune Name: O DASS ICH TAUSEND ZUNGEN HÄTTE (DRETZEL)

First Line: Holy, Holy, Holy! Lord God Almighty
Lord God, to You We All Give Praise
They Leave Their Place on High
Around the Throne of God a Band
In Trembling Hands, Lord God, We Hold
A Mighty Fortress Is Our God
A Mighty Fortress Is Our God
If God Had Not Been on Our Side
Lord, Keep Us Steadfast in Your Word
O God, Our Lord, Your Holy Word
Tune Name: O HERRE GOTT, DEIN GÖTTLICH WORT

First Line: O Lord, Look Down from Heaven
Tune Name: ACH GOTT, VOM HIMMEL SIEH DAREIN

First Line: Wake, Awake, for Night Is Flying
The Day Is Surely Drawing Near
Great God, What Do I See and Hear
Day of Wrath, Oh, Day of Mourning
Who Knows When Death
I Know of a Sleep in Jesus’ Name
Jerusalem, Thou City Fair and High
Forever with the Lord
Jerusalem the Golden
Jerusalem, My Happy Home
Saints, Behold! The Sight Is Glorious
The Head that Once Was Crowned
Then the Glory
Lord, When Your Glory I Shall See
O’er the Distant Mountains Breaking
Blessed Jesus, at Your Word
Songs of Praise the Angels Sang
As We Begin Another Week
God Himself Is Present
This Is the Day the Lord Has Made
To Your Temple I Draw Near
Tune Name: GOTT SEI DANK DURCH ALLE WELT

First Line: Come, Let Us Join Our Cheerful Songs
Come, Rejoice before Your Maker
This Day at Your Creating Word
Lord Jesus Christ, Be Present Now
Tune Name: HERR JESU CHRIST, DICH ZU UNS WEND

First Line: Now the Silence
Lord of My Life, Whose Tender Care
Tune Name: O JESU, WARUM LEGST DU MIR

First Line: All People that on Earth Do Dwell
Praise to the Lord, the Almighty
Praise the Almighty; My Soul, Adore Him
Tune Name: LOBE DEN HERREN, O MEINE SEELE

First Line: All Praise to God Who Reigns Above
Tune Name: LOBT GOTT DEN HERREN, IHR HEIDEN ALL

First Line: Lord of Lords, the Sparkling Heavens
Oh, Bless the Lord, My Soul
Glory Be to God the Father
Immortal, Invisible, God Only Wise
Alleluia! Let Praises Ring
Oh, that I Had a Thousand Voices
Tune Name: O DASS ICH TAUSEND ZUNGEN HÄTTE (KÖNIG)

First Line: Oh, Worship the King
Arise, My Soul, Arise
Sing a New Song to the Lord
The Stars Declare His Glory
Earth and All Stars
When in Our Music God Is Glorified
God of Mercy, God of Grace
From All that Dwell below the Skies
When Morning Gilds the Skies
Oh, Sing to the Lord
I Will Sing My Maker’s Praises
Tune Name: SOLLT ICH MEINEM GOTT NICHT SINGEN

First Line: The Day Full of Grace
Open Now Thy Gates of Beauty
How Great Thou Art
My Soul, Now Bless Your Maker
Now Let All Loudly
When All Your Mercies, O My God
Let All Things Now Living
We Sing the Almighty Power of God
All Glory Be to God Alone
All Glory Be to God on High
Tune Name: ALLEIN GOTT IN DER HÖH SEI EHR

First Line: Glory Be to God in Heaven
This Is the Feast of Victory
Kyrie, God Father in Heaven Above
Isaiah, Mighty Seer in Days of Old
Lamb of God, Pure and Holy
In Peace and Joy I Now Depart
We All Believe in One True God
Tune Name: WIR GLAUBEN ALL AN EINEN GOTT

First Line: We All Believe in One True God
Tune Name: WIR GLAUBEN ALL AN EINEN GOTT

First Line: Create in Me a Clean Heart, O God
Glory Be to the Father
My Soul Now Magnifies the Lord
Blest Be the God of Israel
Praise Be to the Lord
God, We Praise You
Holy God, We Praise Your Name
O Word of God Incarnate
Thy Strong Word
God Has Spoken by His Prophets
Lord, Open Now My Heart to Hear
Speak, O Savior; I Am Listening
How Precious Is the Book Divine
The Ten Commandments Are the Law
The Law Commands and Makes Us Know
The Law of God Is Good and Wise
The Gospel Shows the Father’s Grace
Tune Name: HERR JESU CHRIST, DICH ZU UNS WEND

First Line: Preserve Your Word, O Savior
One Thing’s Needful
We Have a Sure Prophetic Word
The Lord Is God; There Is No Other
God’s Word Is Our Great Heritage
Baptized into Your Name Most Holy
Tune Name: O DASS ICH TAUSEND ZUNGEN HÄTTE (KÖNIG)

First Line: Dearest Jesus, We Are Here
Our Children Jesus Calls
Baptized in Water
Dear Father, You Have Made Us All
Tune Name: HERR JESU CHRIST, DICH ZU UNS WEND

First Line: All Who Believe and Are Baptized
See This Wonder in the Making
We Praise You, Lord
Lord, to You I Make Confession
With Broken Heart and Contrite Sigh
Jesus Sinners Does Receive
From Depths of Woe I Cry to You
Before You, God, the Judge of All
Tune Name: VATER UNSER IM HIMMELREICH, DER DU

First Line: Wondrous Are Your Ways, O God
As Surely As I Live, God Said
Draw Near and Take the Body of the Lord
I Come, O Savior, to Your Table
Soul, Adorn Yourself with Gladness
Lord Jesus Christ, You Have Prepared
Jesus Christ, Our Blessed Savior
Tune Name: JESUS CHRISTUS, UNSER HEILAND, DER VON UNS

First Line: O Living Bread from Heaven
Here, O My Lord, I See You Face to Face
O Jesus, Blessed Lord, to Thee
O Lord, We Praise You
Sent Forth by God’s Blessing
On My Heart Imprint Your Image
On My Heart Imprint Your Image
Savior, Again to Thy Dear Name
On What Has Now Been Sown
Almighty Father, Bless the Word
Almighty God, Your Word Is Cast
How Blest Are They Who Hear
May the Grace of Christ Our Savior
God Be with You till We Meet Again
God Be with You till We Meet Again
Lord, Dismiss Us with Your Blessing
Now, the Hour of Worship O’er
Guide Me, O Thou Great Jehovah
Go, My Children, with My Blessing
Abide, O Dearest Jesus
Praise God, from Whom All Blessings Flow
O Kingly Love, that Faithfully
Come unto Me, Ye Weary
Delay Not! Delay Not
I Heard the Voice of Jesus Say
Today Your Mercy Calls Us
Oh, for a Thousand Tongues to Sing
Crown Him with Many Crowns
Amid the World’s Bleak Wilderness
Christ Is the World’s Light
At the Name of Jesus
In the Cross of Christ I Glory
In You Is Gladness
Jesus! and Shall It Ever Be
Jesus, Jesus, Only Jesus
Jesus, Priceless Treasure
All Praise Be Yours
Hail, O Once-Despised Jesus
Lord, Enthroned in Heavenly Splendor
Praise the One Who Breaks the Darkness
Lamb of God, We Fall before You
Take the World, but Give Me Jesus
You Are the Way; through You Alone
Jesus, Lover of My Soul
How Sweet the Name of Jesus Sounds
Jesus, My Great High Priest
The Lord’s My Shepherd; I’ll Not Want
Let All Mortal Flesh Keep Silence
Lord Jesus Christ, My Savior Blest
The King of Glory Comes
My Heart Is Longing
Love Divine, All Love Excelling
O Jesus So Sweet, O Jesus So Mild
Christ Be My Leader
O Savior, Precious Savior
Beautiful Savior
All Hail the Power of Jesus’ Name
Oh, Love, How Deep
I Lay My Sins on Jesus
O Jesus, King Most Wonderful
My Shepherd Will Supply My Need
The King of Love My Shepherd Is
Jesus, Your Blood and Righteousness
Dear Christians, One and All, Rejoice
All Mankind Fell in Adam’s Fall
Tune Name: WENN WIR IN HÖCHSTEN NÖTEN SEIN

First Line: Amazing Grace — How Sweet the Sound
Lord, ’Tis Not that I Did Choose You
Grace Has a Thrilling Sound
My Hope Is Built on Nothing Less
Blessed Are They, Forever Blest
By Grace I’m Saved
Tune Name: O DASS ICH TAUSEND ZUNGEN HÄTTE (DRETZEL)

First Line: Chief of Sinners Though I Be
Now I Have Found the Firm Foundation
Tune Name: O DASS ICH TAUSEND ZUNGEN HÄTTE (KÖNIG)

First Line: Drawn to the Cross
Redeemed, Restored, Forgiven
Rock of Ages, Cleft for Me
Salvation unto Us Has Come
God Loved the World So that He Gave
Not unto Us
If Your Beloved Son, O God
Blessed Are the Saints of God
Seek Where You May to Find a Way
In Adam We Have All Been One
Just As I Am, without One Plea
Lord, We Confess Our Numerous Faults
To God Be the Glory
O God, O Lord of Heaven and Earth
Your Works, Not Mine, O Christ
My Faith Looks Up to Thee
I Know My Faith Is Founded
Faith Is a Living Power from Heaven
Oh, for a Faith that Will Not Shrink
This Is the Threefold Truth
O Lord, You Have in Your Pure Grace
Tune Name: VATER UNSER IM HIMMELREICH, DER DU

First Line: Christians, While on Earth Abiding
Come, My Soul, with Every Care
Our Father, Who from Heaven Above
Tune Name: VATER UNSER IM HIMMELREICH, DER DU

First Line: What a Friend We Have in Jesus
Lord, Teach Us How to Pray Aright
When in the Hour of Utmost Need
Tune Name: WENN WIR IN HÖCHSTEN NÖTEN SEIN

First Line: I Leave All Things to God’s Direction
Be Still, My Soul
How Firm a Foundation
I’m But a Stranger Here
My God Will Never Leave Me
Tune Name: VON GOTT WILL ICH NICHT LASSEN

First Line: If God Himself Be for Me
God Moves in a Mysterious Way
All Depends on Our Possessing
Jesus, Lead Us On
Not in Anger, Mighty God
O God, Forsake Me Not
Oh, Sing, My Soul, Your Maker’s Praise
Yours Forever, God of Love
We Are the Lord’s
Why Should Cross and Trial Grieve Me
Tune Name: WARUM SOLLT ICH MICH DENN GRÄMEN

First Line: What God Ordains Is Always Good
Evening and Morning
I Walk in Danger All the Way
Tune Name: DER LIEBEN SONNE LICHT UND PRACHT

First Line: I Am Jesus’ Little Lamb
Jesus, Savior, Pilot Me
Lord, You I Love with All My Heart
Tune Name: HERZLICH LIEB HAB ICH DICH, O HERR

First Line: The Will of God Is Always Best
Jesus, Shepherd of the Sheep
I Trust, O Christ, in You Alone
In God, My Faithful God
Lord, Take My Hand and Lead Me
On Eagles’ Wings
O God, Our Help in Ages Past
Have No Fear, Little Flock
Rejoice, My Heart, Be Glad and Sing
If You But Trust in God to Guide You
Through Jesus’ Blood and Merit
I Am Trusting You, Lord Jesus
Who Trusts in God, a Strong Abode
In You, O Lord, I Put My Trust
Children of the Heavenly Father
God, My Lord, My Strength
Precious Lord, Take My Hand
Let Us Ever Walk with Jesus
Come, Follow Me, the Savior Spoke
I Gave My Life for Thee
Rise! To Arms! With Prayer Employ You
Forth in Your Name, O Lord, I Go
Fight the Good Fight
May We Your Precepts, Lord, Fulfill
O God, My Faithful God
How Can I Thank You, Lord
From Eternity, O God
Oh, that the Lord Would Guide My Ways
Jesus Calls Us O’er the Tumult
Jesus Christ, My Pride and Glory
Tune Name: ACH, WAS SOLL ICH SÜNDER MACHEN

First Line: Jesus, I My Cross Have Taken
Though Thoughtless Thousands Choose
May the Mind of Christ My Savior
My God, My Father, Make Me Strong
Take My Life and Let It Be
Praise to You and Adoration
Renew Me, O Eternal Light
Rise, My Soul, to Watch and Pray
Savior, I Follow On
Stand Up, Stand Up for Jesus
The Man Is Ever Blest
Thee Will I Love, My Strength, My Tower
What Is the World to Me
Tune Name: WAS FRAG ICH NACH DER WELT

First Line: With the Lord Begin Your Task
Jesus, Your Boundless Love to Me
Tune Name: VATER UNSER IM HIMMELREICH, DER DU

First Line: Almighty Father, Heaven and Earth
O God, Your Hand the Heavens Made
Forgive Us, Lord
Lord of All Good
Brothers, Sisters, Let Us Gladly
We Give Thee but Thine Own
Lord of Glory, You Have Bought Us
O Lord of Heaven and Earth and Sea
Savior, Thy Dying Love
Lord, You Love the Cheerful Giver
Love in Christ Is Strong and Living
O Master of the Loving Heart
Son of God, Eternal Savior
Forgive Our Sins as We Forgive
Blest Be the Tie that Binds
Not for Tongues of Heaven’s Angels
Glorious in Majesty
This Is My Will
Though I May Speak with Bravest Fire
O God of Mercy, God of Might
For Christian Homes, O Lord, We Pray
Tune Name: GOTTLOB, ES GEHT NUNMEHR ZU ENDE

First Line: Our Father, by Whose Name
Lord of the Home
Oh, Blessed Home, Where Man and Wife
Bless Our Loved Ones, Holy Father
Love Is the Gracious Gift
Oh, Blest the House, Whate’er Befall
Lord of Our Growing Years
Gracious Savior, Gentle Shepherd
How Shall the Young Secure Their Hearts
I Pray You, Dear Lord Jesus
O Lord, Our God, Your Gracious Hand
Tune Name: O HERRE GOTT, DEIN GÖTTLICH WORT

First Line: Let Children Hear the Mighty Deeds
Lord Jesus Christ, the Children’s Friend
Lord, Help Us Ever to Retain
Shepherd of Tender Youth
You Parents, Hear What Jesus Taught
Tune Name: HERR JESU CHRIST, DICH ZU UNS WEND

First Line: Almighty Father, Strong to Save
Forth in the Peace of Christ We Go
O God of Love, O King of Peace
Your Hand, O Lord, in Days of Old
Lord of All Nations, Grant Me Grace
Grant Peace, We Pray, in Mercy, Lord
God of Grace and God of Glory
O Fount of Good, for All Your Love
The Son of God, Our Christ
We Are Your People
Weary of All Trumpeting
Christ Is Our Cornerstone
Built on the Rock
Tune Name: KIRKEN DEN ER ET GAMMELT HUS

First Line: Hark! The Church Proclaims Her Honor
Christ Is Made the Sure Foundation
God Is Here! As We His People
I Love Your Kingdom, Lord
In the Midst of Earthly Life
Our Fathers’ God in Years Long Gone
Lord Jesus Christ, the Church’s Head
Onward, Christian Soldiers
The Church’s One Foundation
In Christ There Is No East or West
Rejoice, O Pilgrim Throng
Lord Jesus Christ, with Us Abide
Dear Lord, to Your True Servants Give
God of the Prophets
Preach You the Word
Tune Name: O HEILAND, REISS DIE HIMMEL AUF

First Line: Send, O Lord, Your Holy Spirit
Lord Jesus, You Have Come
We Bid You Welcome in the Name
O Lord, in Prayer You Spent the Night
Around the Throne, a Glorious Band
Behold a Host, Arrayed in White
For All the Saints
By All Your Saints Still Striving
Give Thanks to God on High
Oh, How Blest Are They
For All Your Saints, O Lord
Rise, Shine, You People
On Galilee’s High Mountain
Christ High-Ascended
Lord of the Living Harvest
I Hear the Savior Calling
Lord, Speak to Us that We May Speak
I Love to Tell the Story
Go Labor On
There Is a Balm in Gilead
There Still Is Room
We All Are One in Mission
Awake, O Spirit, Who Inspired
Good News of God Above
O Christ, Our True and Only Light
O Christians, Haste
From Greenland’s Icy Mountains
Send Forth, O Lord, to Every Place
Hark! The Voice of Jesus Crying
May God Bestow on Us His Grace
Tune Name: ES WOLLE GOTT UNS GNÄDIG SEIN

First Line: How Shall They Hear the Word of God
Spread, Oh, Spread the Mighty Word
Rise, O Light of Gentile Nations
Saints of God, the Dawn Is Brightening
Lift High the Cross
Every Morning Mercies New
Father, We Praise You
Awake, My Soul, and with the Sun
Now that the Daylight Fills the Sky
O Blessed, Holy Trinity
While Yet the Morn Is Breaking
O Splendor of God’s Glory Bright
Now Rest Beneath Night’s Shadow
Tune Name: O WELT, ICH MUSS DICH LASSEN

First Line: Abide with Me
Now the Day Is Over
God, Who Made the Earth and Heaven
O Trinity, Most Blessed Light
All Praise to Thee, My God, This Night
Now the Light Has Gone Away
The Day You Gave Us, Lord, Is Ended
Before the Ending of the Day
Let Me Be Yours Forever
May God the Father of Our Lord
My Maker, Be with Me
Our Lord and God, Oh, Bless This Day
O Perfect Love
Your Love, O God, Has Called Us Here
God of Love and God of Marriage
Hear Us Now, Our God and Father
O Love that Casts Out Fear
Asleep in Jesus! Blessed Sleep
For Me to Live Is Jesus
How Blest Are They
I Fall Asleep in Jesus’ Wounds
Tune Name: VATER UNSER IM HIMMELREICH, DER DU

First Line: We Praise You, O God, Our Redeemer
Now Thank We All Our God
For the Fruit of His Creation
Praise to God, Immortal Praise
Come, You Thankful People, Come
Sing to the Lord of Harvest
We Thank You for Your Blessings
Feed Your Children, God Most Holy
Christ, by Heavenly Hosts Adored
Before the Lord We Bow
God Bless Our Native Land
To You, Our God, We Fly
For Years on Years of Matchless Grace
For Many Years, O God of Grace
God the Father, Son, and Spirit
Zion, at Your Shining Gates
Prepare the Royal Highway
My Soul in Stillness Waits
Lo, He Comes With Clouds Descending
The Night Will Soon Be Ending
A Stable Lamp Is Lighted
Peace Came to Earth
Now Greet the Swiftly Changing Year
Christ, Your Footprints Through the Desert
Jesus, Once With Sinners Numbered
Jesus Has Come and Brings Pleasure Eternal
Tune Name: JESUS IST KOMMEN, GRUND EWIGER FREUDE

First Line: Jesus, Take Us to the Mountain
In Silent Pain the Eternal Son
The Lamb
What Grace Is This!
No Tramp of Soldiers’ Marching Feet
Tune Name: NO TRAMP OF SOLDIERS’ MARCHING FEET

First Line: When You Woke That Thursday Morning
Rest, O Christ, From All Your Labor
Tune Name: O MEIN JESU, ICH MUSS STERBEN

First Line: Christ Has Arisen, Alleluia
Christ Jesus Lay in Death’s Strong Bands
If Christ Had Not Been Raised From Death
Scatter the Darkness, Break the Gloom
Holy Spirit, the Dove Sent From Heaven
Voices Raised to You We Offer
The God of Love
Christ, the Lord of Hosts, Unshaken
There Is a Higher Throne
Jerusalem the Golden
There Is a Blessed Home
Blessed Are They
The King Will Come at Age’s End
We Are Singing
Rejoice in God
When in Our Music God Is Glorified
Speak, O Lord
All Christians Who Have Been Baptized
God’s Own Child, I Gladly Say It
In Hopelessness and Near Despair
Baptismal Waters Cover Me
Draw Near
Take and Eat
What Is This Bread?
O Gracious Lord, I Firmly Am Believing
You Satisfy the Hungry Heart
May the Peace of God
You, Lord, Are Both Lamb and Shepherd
There Is a Redeemer
Lamb of God
The Love of Christ, Who Died for Me
Christ, the Word of God Incarnate
Word of God, When All Was Silent
In Christ Alone
Father, God of Grace, You Knew Us
The Tree of Life
Your Kingdom, O God
We Walk by Faith and Not by Sight
Where Your Treasure Is
Blest Are They
Do Not Let Your Hearts Be Troubled
Tune Name: DO NOT LET YOUR HEARTS BE TROUBLED

First Line: When Peace Like a River
Christ Is With Me
Consider How the Birds Above
Jesus Sat With His Disciples
There Is a Time for Everything
Day by Day
